questions.question: Which planet has life (that we know of)?
questions.fact: Earth is the only planet with life on it (that we know of).

questions.question: Which planet is closest to the sun?
questions.fact: Mercury is the closest planet to the sun.

questions.question: Which planet is farthest from the sun?
questions.fact: uranus is the farthest planet from the sun.

questions.question: Which planets have no rings
questions.fact: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, and Jupiter have no visible rings.
